statements: DELETE FROM RiskMetrics WHERE id = 1 AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM RiskMetrics WHERE trade_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND risk_score > 0.5;
DELETE FROM TradingAlgorithms WHERE name = 'TrendFollower' AND strategy = 'Momentum';
DELETE FROM TradeOrders WHERE order_id = 100 AND order_type = 'BUY';
DELETE FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (SELECT strategy_id FROM trade_executions WHERE execution_id < 50);
DELETE FROM TradingAlgorithms WHERE algorithm_type = 'Trend Following';
